<h1 align="center">
  Next.js basic starter blog
</h1>

This is a really basic blog site built with Next.js. I built this while following along with the Next.js intro docs.

<p align="left">You can view the <a href="https://blog.jordanholt.dev/">live site here.</a></p>

### Features

- 💅 CSS Modules
- ✍ Posts written in markdown

### Technologies

- Next v9.5.3
- React v16.13.1
- 💅 CSS Modules
- ✍ Remark v12.0.01

### Install

1. Download the repo
2. `cd` into the repo location
3. `npm install` to download the dependencies
4. `npm dev` to start the development server
